## Type of Change

- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Breaking change

## Checklist

- [ ] Tests added/updated and passing (`poetry run pytest`)
- [ ] Code formatted (`poetry run black .`)
- [ ] Linting passes (`poetry run ruff check .`)
- [ ] Type checks pass (`poetry run mypy specwright`)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if public API changed)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md entry added
